## How to End War and Disease in 60 Seconds

**The Problem:** [150,000 people die daily](brain/book/problem/the-daily-massacre.qmd) from curable diseases.
Humanity spends [\$2.7 trillion on weapons, \$68 billion on medical research](brain/book/problem/the-119-trillion-death-toilet.qmd) (40X more on killing than curing).

**The Goal:** Get 190 nations to sign a treaty redirecting just 1% of military budgets (\$27B/year) to fund cheaper medical trials.
[Oxford proved](brain/book/appendix/recovery-trial.qmd) trials can cost \$500 per patient instead of the current \$41,000 (82X cheaper).

**How to Make It Happen (With \$1B):**

1.  **Sell investment bonds** - Raise \$1B by offering investors 10% of the \$27B annual treaty funds forever = \$2.7B/year = 270% returns.
2.  **Run global referendum campaign** - Spend \$56-140M to get 280 million people to vote "yes, redirect 1% to cures" (costs \$0.20-0.50 per vote for digital outreach).
3.  **Offer bonds to defense industry** - Give \$5-20M in bonds to lobbyists/executives (270% returns beats their \$500K-2M salaries, so they switch sides).
4.  **Fund political campaigns** - Spend \$800M on Super PACs supporting politicians who vote yes, opposing those who vote no.
5.  **Treaty passes** - Politicians face 280M angry voters + see everyone profiting from cures.

**Why This Works (Aligned Incentives):**

- **Defense contractors:** Keep 99% of their budgets (\$2.67T) AND get 270% bond returns - win/win.
- **Pharma companies:** Stop paying \$48K per trial patient.
Instead GET PAID by patients (who have subsidies).
- **Politicians:** Get campaign funding + avoid being voted out by 280 million referendum supporters.
- **Insurance companies:** Healthy people cost billions less than sick people.
- **Patients:** Get paid to participate in trials + vote directly on which diseases get funded.

**The Math:** Every \$1 invested creates [\$463 in benefits](brain/book/appendix/dfda-cost-benefit-analysis.qmd).
